short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps narrow down roblox games to make it easier to find new ones!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds some options when browsing games on the discover page or the search page on roblox.com.

With this, you are able to sort through the currently visible games on the page to find some of the more hidden games that aren't usually found by the public.

Or you can use it to sort through games on the search page more easier to find what you are looking for specifically.

You should install this if you are bored and are looking for some different games on Roblox that are buried in the sea of copy and paste games.

You use it by setting the minimum and maximum settings for all, players, visits, and favorites, and then click the "Sort Through Shown Games" Option a couple of times, as new game continue to load in as you are hiding the checked games.
